00071 // Utility methods
00072 
00073 template <typename IntegerT, typename FloatT>
00074 inline IntegerT
00075 floatingPointToFixedPoint(const FloatT s)
00076 {
00077     if (FloatT(0.0) > s) return std::numeric_limits<IntegerT>::min();
00078     else if (FloatT(1.0) <= s) return std::numeric_limits<IntegerT>::max();
00079     return IntegerT(std::floor(s * FloatT(std::numeric_limits<IntegerT>::max())));
00080 }
00081 
00082 
00083 template <typename FloatT, typename IntegerT>
00084 inline FloatT
00085 fixedPointToFloatingPoint(const IntegerT s)
00086 {
00087     return FloatT(s) / FloatT((std::numeric_limits<IntegerT>::max()));
00088 }
00089 
00090 
00091 template <typename IntegerVectorT, typename FloatT>
00092 inline IntegerVectorT
00093 floatingPointToFixedPoint(const math::Vec3<FloatT>& v)
00094 {
00095     return IntegerVectorT(
00096         floatingPointToFixedPoint<typename IntegerVectorT::ValueType>(v.x()),
00097         floatingPointToFixedPoint<typename IntegerVectorT::ValueType>(v.y()),
00098         floatingPointToFixedPoint<typename IntegerVectorT::ValueType>(v.z()));
00099 }
00100 
00101 template <typename FloatVectorT, typename IntegerT>
00102 inline FloatVectorT
00103 fixedPointToFloatingPoint(const math::Vec3<IntegerT>& v)
00104 {
00105     return FloatVectorT(
00106         fixedPointToFloatingPoint<typename FloatVectorT::ValueType>(v.x()),
00107         fixedPointToFloatingPoint<typename FloatVectorT::ValueType>(v.y()),
00108         fixedPointToFloatingPoint<typename FloatVectorT::ValueType>(v.z()));
00109 }

00116 template<typename StorageType_>
00117 struct NullAttributeCodec
00118 {
00119     typedef StorageType_ StorageType;
00120     template<typename ValueType> static void decode(const StorageType&, ValueType&);
00121     template<typename ValueType> static void encode(const StorageType&, ValueType&);
00122     static const char* name() { return "null"; }
00123 };

00127 struct FixedPointAttributeCodec

00131     template<typename ValueType> static void encode(const ValueType&, StorageType&);
00132     static const char* name() { return "fxpt"; }
00133 };

00149 class AttributeArray
00150 {
00151 public:
00152     typedef boost::shared_ptr<AttributeArray>           Ptr;
00153     typedef boost::shared_ptr<const AttributeArray>     ConstPtr;
00154 
00155     struct AccessorBase;
00156     template <typename T> struct Accessor;
00157 
00158     typedef boost::shared_ptr<AccessorBase>             AccessorBasePtr;
00159 
00160     template <typename> friend class AttributeHandle;
00161 
00162     typedef Ptr (*FactoryMethod)(size_t);
00163 
00164     AttributeArray() : mCompressedBytes(0), mFlags(0) {}
00165     virtual ~AttributeArray() {}
00166 
00168     virtual AttributeArray::Ptr copy() const = 0;
00169 
00171     virtual AttributeArray::Ptr copyUncompressed() const = 0;
00172 
00174     virtual size_t size() const = 0;
00175 
00177     virtual size_t memUsage() const = 0;
00178 
00180     static Ptr create(const NamePair& type, size_t length);
00182     static bool isRegistered(const NamePair& type);
00184     static void clearRegistry();
00185 
00187     virtual const NamePair& type() const = 0;
00189     template<typename AttributeArrayType>
00190     bool isType() const { return this->type() == AttributeArrayType::attributeType(); }
00191 
00193     virtual void set(const Index n, const AttributeArray& sourceArray, const Index sourceIndex) = 0;
00194 
00196     virtual bool isUniform() const = 0;
00199     virtual void expand(bool fill = true) = 0;
00201     virtual void collapse() = 0;
00202 
00204     bool isCompressed() const { return mCompressedBytes != 0; }
00206     virtual bool compress() = 0;
00208     virtual bool decompress() = 0;
00209 
00214     void setHidden(bool state);
00216     bool isHidden() const { return bool(mFlags & HIDDEN); }
00217 
00221     void setTransient(bool state);
00223     bool isTransient() const { return bool(mFlags & TRANSIENT); }
00224 
00226     virtual void read(std::istream&) = 0;
00228     virtual void write(std::ostream&) const = 0;
00229 
00233     bool operator==(const AttributeArray& other) const;
00234     bool operator!=(const AttributeArray& other) const { return !this->operator==(other); }
00235 
00236 private:
00239     virtual bool isEqual(const AttributeArray& other) const = 0;
00240 
00241 protected:
00243     virtual AccessorBasePtr getAccessor() const = 0;
00244 
00246     static void registerType(const NamePair& type, FactoryMethod);
00248     static void unregisterType(const NamePair& type);
00249 
00250     enum { TRANSIENT = 0x1, HIDDEN = 0x2 };
00251     size_t mCompressedBytes;
00252     uint16_t mFlags;
00253 }; // class AttributeArray

00286     typedef boost::shared_ptr<const TypedAttributeArray>    ConstPtr;
00287

00290     typedef typename Codec::StorageType StorageType;
00291 
00293

00296         const ValueType& uniformValue = zeroVal<ValueType>());

00300     TypedAttributeArray& operator=(const TypedAttributeArray&);

00365     virtual bool decompress();

00410     AttributeHandle(const AttributeArray& array, const bool preserveCompression = true);

00413

00415     const AttributeArray* mArray;
00416 
00417     GetterPtr mGetter;

00419 
00420 private:
00421     // local copy of AttributeArray (to preserve compression)

00449 template<typename StorageType_>
00450 template<typename ValueType>
00451 inline void
00452 NullAttributeCodec<StorageType_>::decode(const StorageType& data, ValueType& val)
00453 {
00454     val = static_cast<ValueType>(data);
00455 }
00456 
00457 
00458 template<typename StorageType_>
00459 template<typename ValueType>
00460 inline void
00461 NullAttributeCodec<StorageType_>::encode(const StorageType& val, ValueType& data)
00462 {
00463     data = static_cast<StorageType>(val);
00464 }
00465 
00466 
00467 template<typename IntType>
00468 template<typename ValueType>
00469 inline void
00470 FixedPointAttributeCodec<IntType>::decode(const StorageType& data, ValueType& val)
00471 {
00472     val = fixedPointToFloatingPoint<ValueType>(data);
00473 
00474     // shift value range to be -0.5 => 0.5 (as this is most commonly used for position)
00475 
00476     val -= ValueType(0.5);
00477 }
00478 
00479 
00480 template<typename IntType>
00481 template<typename ValueType>
00482 inline void
00483 FixedPointAttributeCodec<IntType>::encode(const ValueType& val, StorageType& data)
00484 {
00485     // shift value range to be -0.5 => 0.5 (as this is most commonly used for position)
00486 
00487     const ValueType newVal = val + ValueType(0.5);
00488 
00489     data = floatingPointToFixedPoint<StorageType>(newVal);
00490 }
00491 
00492 
00493 template<typename T>
00494 inline void
00495 UnitVecAttributeCodec::decode(const StorageType& data, math::Vec3<T>& val)
00496 {
00497     val = math::QuantizedUnitVec::unpack(data);
00498 }
00499 
00500 
00501 template<typename T>
00502 inline void
00503 UnitVecAttributeCodec::encode(const math::Vec3<T>& val, StorageType& data)
00504 {
00505     data = math::QuantizedUnitVec::pack(val);
00506 }

00511 // TypedAttributeArray implementation
00512 
00513 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00514 tbb::atomic<const NamePair*> TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::sTypeName;
00515 
00516 
00517 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00518 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::TypedAttributeArray(
00519     size_t n, const ValueType& uniformValue)
00520     : AttributeArray()
00521     , mData(new StorageType[1])
00522     , mSize(n)
00523     , mIsUniform(true)
00524     , mMutex()
00525 {
00526     mSize = std::max(size_t(1), mSize);
00527     Codec::encode(uniformValue, mData[0]);
00528 }
00529 
00530 
00531 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00532 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::TypedAttributeArray(const TypedAttributeArray& rhs, const bool decompress)
00533     : AttributeArray(rhs)
00534     , mData(NULL)
00535     , mSize(rhs.mSize)
00536     , mIsUniform(rhs.mIsUniform)
00537     , mMutex()
00538 {
00539     if (mIsUniform) {
00540         mData = new StorageType[1];
00541         mData[0] = rhs.mData[0];
00542     } else if (mCompressedBytes != 0 && decompress) {
00543         this->decompress(rhs.mData);
00544     } else if (mCompressedBytes != 0) {
00545         char* buffer = new char[mCompressedBytes];
00546         memcpy(buffer, rhs.mData, mCompressedBytes);
00547         mData = reinterpret_cast<StorageType*>(buffer);
00548     } else {
00549         mData = new StorageType[mSize];
00550         memcpy(mData, rhs.mData, mSize * sizeof(StorageType));
00551     }
00552 }
00553 
00554 
00555 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00556 typename TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::TypedAttributeArray&
00557 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::operator=(const TypedAttributeArray& rhs)
00558 {
00559     if (&rhs != this) {
00560         this->deallocate();
00561 
00562         mFlags= rhs.mFlags;
00563         mCompressedBytes = rhs.mCompressedBytes;
00564         mSize = rhs.mSize;
00565         mIsUniform = rhs.mIsUniform;
00566 
00567         if (mIsUniform) {
00568             mData = new StorageType[1];
00569             mData[0] = rhs.mData[0];
00570         } else if (mCompressedBytes != 0) {
00571             char* buffer = new char[mCompressedBytes];
00572             memcpy(buffer, rhs.mData, mCompressedBytes);
00573             mData = reinterpret_cast<StorageType*>(buffer);
00574         } else {
00575             mData = new StorageType[mSize];
00576             memcpy(mData, rhs.mData, mSize * sizeof(StorageType));
00577         }
00578     }
00579 }
00580 
00581 
00582 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00583 inline const NamePair&
00584 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::attributeType()
00585 {
00586     if (sTypeName == NULL) {
00587         std::ostringstream ostr1, ostr2;
00588         ostr1 << typeNameAsString<ValueType>();
00589         ostr2 << Codec::name() << "_" << typeNameAsString<StorageType>();
00590         NamePair* s = new NamePair(ostr1.str(), ostr2.str());
00591         if (sTypeName.compare_and_swap(s, NULL) != NULL) delete s;
00592     }
00593     return *sTypeName;
00594 }

00644 
00645 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00646 size_t
00647 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::arrayMemUsage() const
00648 {
00649     return mCompressedBytes != 0 ? mCompressedBytes :
00650         (mIsUniform ? sizeof(StorageType) : (mSize * sizeof(StorageType)));
00651 }
00652 
00653 
00654 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00655 void
00656 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::allocate(bool fill)
00657 {
00658     tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock lock(mMutex);
00659 
00660     StorageType val = mIsUniform ? mData[0] : zeroVal<StorageType>();
00661 
00662     if (mData) {
00663         delete[] mData;
00664         mData = NULL;
00665     }
00666 
00667     mCompressedBytes = 0;
00668     mIsUniform = false;
00669 
00670     mData = new StorageType[mSize];
00671     if (fill) {
00672         for (size_t i = 0; i < mSize; ++i) mData[i] = val;
00673     }
00674 }
00675 
00676 
00677 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00678 void
00679 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::deallocate()
00680 {
00681     if (mData) {
00682         delete[] mData;
00683         mData = NULL;
00684     }
00685 }
00686 
00687 
00688 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00689 size_t
00690 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::memUsage() const
00691 {
00692     return sizeof(*this) + (mData != NULL ? this->arrayMemUsage() : 0);
00693 }
00694 
00695 
00696 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00697 typename TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::ValueType
00698 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::get(Index n) const
00699 {
00700     if (mCompressedBytes != 0) const_cast<TypedAttributeArray*>(this)->decompress();
00701     if (mIsUniform) n = 0;
00702 
00703     ValueType val;
00704     Codec::decode(/*in=*/mData[n], /*out=*/val);
00705     return val;
00706 }
00707 
00708 
00709 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00710 template<typename T>
00711 void
00712 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::get(Index n, T& val) const
00713 {
00714     if (mCompressedBytes != 0) const_cast<TypedAttributeArray*>(this)->decompress();
00715     if (mIsUniform) n = 0;
00716 
00717     ValueType tmp;
00718     Codec::decode(/*in=*/mData[n], /*out=*/tmp);
00719     val = static_cast<T>(tmp);
00720 }
00721 
00722 
00723 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00724 typename TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::ValueType
00725 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::get(const AttributeArray* array, const Index n)
00726 {
00727     return static_cast<const TypedAttributeArray<ValueType, Codec>*>(array)->get(n);
00728 }
00729 
00730 
00731 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00732 void
00733 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::set(Index n, const ValueType& val)
00734 {
00735     if (mCompressedBytes != 0) this->decompress();
00736     if (mIsUniform) this->allocate();
00737 
00738     Codec::encode(/*in=*/val, /*out=*/mData[n]);
00739 }
00740 
00741 
00742 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00743 template<typename T>
00744 void
00745 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::set(Index n, const T& val)
00746 {
00747     const ValueType tmp = static_cast<ValueType>(val);
00748 
00749     if (mCompressedBytes != 0) this->decompress();
00750     if (mIsUniform) this->allocate();
00751 
00752     Codec::encode(/*in=*/tmp, /*out=*/mData[n]);
00753 }
00754 
00755 
00756 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00757 void
00758 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::set(Index n, const AttributeArray& sourceArray, const Index sourceIndex)
00759 {
00760     const TypedAttributeArray& sourceTypedArray = static_cast<const TypedAttributeArray&>(sourceArray);
00761 
00762     ValueType sourceValue;
00763     sourceTypedArray.get(sourceIndex, sourceValue);
00764 
00765     this->set(n, sourceValue);
00766 }
00767 
00768 
00769 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00770 void
00771 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::set(AttributeArray* array, const Index n, const ValueType& value)
00772 {
00773     static_cast<TypedAttributeArray<ValueType, Codec>*>(array)->set(n, value);
00774 }

00777 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00778 void
00779 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::collapse()
00780 {
00781     this->collapse(zeroVal<ValueType>());
00782 }
00783 
00784 
00785 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00786 void
00787 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::collapse(const ValueType& uniformValue)
00788 {
00789     if (!mIsUniform) {
00790         this->deallocate();
00791         mData = new StorageType[1];
00792         mIsUniform = true;
00793     }
00794     Codec::encode(uniformValue, mData[0]);
00795 }
00796 
00797 
00798 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00799 void
00800 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::expand(bool fill)
00801 {
00802     this->allocate(fill);
00803 }

00805 
00806 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00807 inline bool
00808 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::compress()
00809 {
00810 #ifdef OPENVDB_USE_BLOSC
00811 
00812     tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock lock(mMutex);
00813 
00814     if (!mIsUniform && mCompressedBytes == 0) {
00815 
00816         const int inBytes = int(mSize * sizeof(StorageType));
00817         int bufBytes = inBytes + BLOSC_MAX_OVERHEAD;
00818         boost::scoped_array<char> outBuf(new char[bufBytes]);
00819 
00820         bufBytes = blosc_compress_ctx(
00821             /*clevel=*/9, // 0 (no compression) to 9 (maximum compression)
00822             /*doshuffle=*/true,
00823             /*typesize=*/1,
00824             /*srcsize=*/inBytes,
00825             /*src=*/mData,
00826             /*dest=*/outBuf.get(),
00827             /*destsize=*/bufBytes,
00828             BLOSC_LZ4_COMPNAME,
00829             /*blocksize=*/256,
00830             /*numthreads=*/1);
00831 
00832         if (bufBytes <= 0) {
00833             std::ostringstream ostr;
00834             ostr << "Blosc failed to compress " << inBytes << " byte" << (inBytes == 1 ? "" : "s");
00835             if (bufBytes < 0) ostr << " (internal error " << bufBytes << ")";
00836             OPENVDB_LOG_DEBUG(ostr.str());
00837             return false;
00838         }
00839 
00840         this->deallocate();
00841 
00842         char* outData = new char[bufBytes];
00843         std::memcpy(outData, outBuf.get(), size_t(bufBytes));
00844         mData = reinterpret_cast<StorageType*>(outData);
00845 
00846         mCompressedBytes = size_t(bufBytes);
00847         return true;
00848     }
00849 
00850 #else
00851     OPENVDB_LOG_DEBUG("Can't compress array data without the blosc library.");
00852 #endif
00853 
00854     return false;
00855 }
00856 
00857 
00858 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00859 inline bool
00860 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::decompress(const StorageType* compressedData)
00861 {
00862 #ifdef OPENVDB_USE_BLOSC
00863 
00864     size_t inBytes, compressedBytes, blockSize;
00865     blosc_cbuffer_sizes(compressedData, &inBytes, &compressedBytes, &blockSize);
00866 
00867     int bufBytes = inBytes + BLOSC_MAX_OVERHEAD;
00868     boost::scoped_array<char> outBuf(new char[bufBytes]);
00869 
00870     const int outBytes = blosc_decompress_ctx(
00871          /*src=*/compressedData, /*dest=*/outBuf.get(), bufBytes, /*numthreads=*/1);
00872 
00873     if (bufBytes < 1) {
00874         OPENVDB_LOG_DEBUG("blosc_decompress() returned error code " << bufBytes);
00875         return false;
00876     }
00877 
00878     if (mData) delete[] mData;
00879 
00880     char* outData = new char[outBytes];
00881     std::memcpy(outData, outBuf.get(), size_t(outBytes));
00882     mData = reinterpret_cast<StorageType*>(outData);
00883 
00884     mCompressedBytes = 0;
00885     return true;
00886 
00887 #else
00888 
00889     OPENVDB_THROW(RuntimeError, "Can't extract compressed data without the blosc library.");
00890 
00891 #endif
00892 }
00893 
00894 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00895 inline bool
00896 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::decompress()
00897 {
00898     tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock lock(mMutex);
00899 
00900     if (mCompressedBytes != 0) {
00901         return this->decompress(this->mData);
00902     }
00903 
00904     return false;
00905 }
00906 
00907 
00908 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00909 void
00910 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::read(std::istream& is)
00911 {
00912     // AttributeArray data
00913     Int16 flags = Int16(0);
00914     is.read(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&flags), sizeof(Int16));
00915     mFlags = flags;
00916 
00917     Index64 compressedBytes = Index64(0);
00918     is.read(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&compressedBytes), sizeof(Index64));
00919     mCompressedBytes = size_t(compressedBytes);
00920 
00921     // TypedAttributeArray data
00922     Int16 isUniform = Int16(0);
00923     is.read(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&isUniform), sizeof(Int16));
00924     mIsUniform = bool(isUniform);
00925 
00926     Index64 arrayLength = Index64(0);
00927     is.read(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&arrayLength), sizeof(Index64));
00928     mSize = size_t(arrayLength);
00929 
00930     this->deallocate();
00931     const size_t bufferSize = this->arrayMemUsage();
00932 
00933     char* buffer = new char[bufferSize];
00934     is.read(buffer, bufferSize);
00935     mData = reinterpret_cast<StorageType*>(buffer);
00936 }
00937 
00938 
00939 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00940 void
00941 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::write(std::ostream& os) const
00942 {
00943     if (!this->isTransient()) {
00944 
00945         // AttributeArray data
00946         os.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&mFlags), sizeof(Int16));
00947 
00948         Index64 compressedBytes = Index64(mCompressedBytes);
00949         os.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&compressedBytes), sizeof(Index64));
00950 
00951         // TypedAttributeArray data
00952         Int16 isUniform = Int16(mIsUniform);
00953         os.write(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&isUniform), sizeof(Int16));
00954 
00955         Index64 arrayLength = Index64(mSize);
00956         os.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&arrayLength), sizeof(Index64));
00957 
00958         os.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(mData), this->arrayMemUsage());
00959 
00960     }
00961 }
00962 
00963 
00964 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00965 AttributeArray::AccessorBasePtr
00966 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::getAccessor() const
00967 {
00968     return AccessorBasePtr(new AttributeArray::Accessor<ValueType_>(
00969         &TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::get, &TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::set));
00970 }
00971 
00972 
00973 template<typename ValueType_, typename Codec_>
00974 bool
00975 TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>::isEqual(const AttributeArray& other) const
00976 {
00977     const TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>* const otherT = dynamic_cast<const TypedAttributeArray<ValueType_, Codec_>* >(&other);
00978     if(!otherT) return false;
00979     if(this->mSize != otherT->mSize ||
00980        this->mIsUniform != otherT->mIsUniform ||
00981        *this->sTypeName != *otherT->sTypeName) return false;
00982 
00983     const StorageType *target = this->mData, *source = otherT->mData;
00984     if (!target && !source) return true;
00985     if (!target || !source) return false;
00986     Index n = this->mIsUniform ? 1 : mSize;
00987     while (n && math::isExactlyEqual(*target++, *source++)) --n;
00988     return n == 0;
00989 }
00990 
00992 
00993 // AttributeHandle implementation
00994 
00995 template <typename T>
00996 AttributeHandle<T>::AttributeHandle(const AttributeArray& array, const bool preserveCompression)
00997     : mArray(&array)
00998 {
00999     // if array is compressed and preserve compression is true, copy and decompress
01000     // into a local copy that is destroyed with handle to maintain thread-safety
01001 
01002     if (array.isCompressed() && preserveCompression) {
01003         mLocalArray = array.copyUncompressed();
01004         mLocalArray->decompress();
01005         mArray = mLocalArray.get();
01006     }
01007 
01008     // bind getter and setter methods
01009 
01010     AttributeArray::AccessorBasePtr accessor = mArray->getAccessor();
01011     assert(accessor);
01012 
01013     AttributeArray::Accessor<T>* typedAccessor = static_cast<AttributeArray::Accessor<T>*>(accessor.get());
01014 
01015     if (!typedAccessor) {
01016         OPENVDB_THROW(RuntimeError, "Cannot bind AttributeHandle due to mis-matching types.");
01017     }
01018 
01019     mGetter = typedAccessor->mGetter;
01020     mSetter = typedAccessor->mSetter;
01021 }
01022 
01023 
01024 template <typename T>
01025 T AttributeHandle<T>::get(Index n) const
01026 {
01027     return mGetter(mArray, n);
01028 }
01029 
01031 
01032 // AttributeWriteHandle implementation
01033 
01034 template <typename T>
01035 AttributeWriteHandle<T>::AttributeWriteHandle(AttributeArray& array)
01036     : AttributeHandle<T>(array, /*preserveCompression = */ false) { }
01037 
01038 template <typename T>
01039 void AttributeWriteHandle<T>::set(Index n, const T& value)
01040 {
01041     this->mSetter(const_cast<AttributeArray*>(this->mArray), n, value);
01042 }
